sub_title: Digital Marketing >> SEO >> PPC >> Technology >> Automation
summary:
8 Years of marketing experience within the fields of paid digital channels, search engine optimization, organic traffic, marketing automation, content creation and lead generation through online tools for B2B and B2C companies. 

Im Structured, Super Creative, an Analytical Thinker and have Professional Writing Skills.

Looks to add value through client relationships and the interpretation of collected data to make sound innovative and profitable marketing solutions.

Specialties: Digital Marketing ; Strategic Development; Brand Development; Brand Management and Communication; Data Analysis; Electronic and Social Media Marketing; Services and Retail Marketing; Cultural Communication; Sales;Sourcing

profile_positions.description:
Here is a chatGPT summary of the Job description :)

-Accountable for revenue and profit growth targets for TIP Insight
-Owns attachment and engagement rate metrics for Insight
-Primary responsibility for commercial activities and setting up commercial roadmap
-Strategize and validate value-based pricing and customer experience
-Manage launch phases and post-launch process for gathering feedback
-Engage regional teams and support local go-to-market strategies
-Supervise design and rollout of commercial processes and policies
-Advise on positioning, messaging, and market segmentation strategies
-Monitor competition and industry trends
-Work with sales teams to educate and interact with customers
-Drive customer preference through demos and comparisons
profile_positions.title: Product Marketing Manager - Commercial Connected and Digital Solutions

profile_positions.description:
Define, execute and update the online marketing strategy to drive qualified traffic to TIP site through automation, paid search, organic search (SEO), affiliate and traditional online display and social display channels
▪ 	Since Jan 2020 webleads increased by 70% using no PPC
▪ 	Since Jan 2020 web traffic increased by 83% using no PPC
Customer Centricity
▪ 	Review and analysis of web site performance metrics -leads, opportunities, traffic, landing pages, conversions
▪ 	Optimization of campaigns and website
▪ 	Developed reporting to support marketing decision making and turn the marketing team into a profit centre
▪ 	Implement and project manage new digital technology (chatbots, HOTJAR, lead forensics)
SEO
▪ 	Keyword research (discovery and expansion)
▪ 	Website migration - Migrating 16 websites to one (www.tip-group.com)
▪ 	Writing and editing of creative copy (titles and descriptions) – metatags
▪ 	Designed competitive analysis research to help analyse and monitor keyword rankings
Marketing Automation
▪ 	Setting up engagement programs and enabling marketing automation through different channels using PARDOT
▪ 	Execute customer acquisition strategies where the main KPI is to drive sales leads in salesforce
▪ 	Create targeted content for gated content to social media posts.
PPC
▪ 	Design and support in-house management of PPC campaigns
Misc.
▪ 	Marketing budget and payment management
▪ 	Process building with sales teams and marketing 
▪ 	Support in development and go to market of new products
▪ 	Oversee contracts and management of TIPs development and creative agencies
▪ 	Stakeholder and user training, problem solver for anything online marketing related
▪ 	Direct management of 2 interns and indirect management of online strategy for 5 regional marketing teams
profile_positions.title: Online Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the execution of Paid Search, PLAs, Affiliates, Retargeting,Price Comparison Websites and display campaigns.

Manage the Digital Account for Staples NL, DE and Nordics and monitor performance with the use of: 
- Google adwords,Google analytics, Omniture and Google Merchant Centre. Working with an agency to optimize all digital campaigns across vehicles to deliver positive margin and ROI within budget. 

Building, management and optimization of all of Staples data feeds for Europe. 

Develop and implement creative assets that are used in the various digital vehicles. 

Forecasting and Budget support.
